name: Global Summit and Expo on Biotechnology and Bioengineering
content: It is a great pleasure and an honor to extend to all a warm invitation to attend the “Global Summit and Expo on Biotechnology and Bioengineering (GSEBB2021)”, will be held on October 21-23, 2021 at Valencia, Spain. The objective of GSEBB2021 is to provide a unique forum for discussion of the latest developments, refresh your knowledge and will offer plenty of networking opportunities, providing you a chance to meet and interact with leading researchers as well as most influential minds in the fields of Biotechnology and Bioengineering.
